name: Cyber Racer
description:
Cyber Racer is one of a kind VR game in cybernetic neon style. Get ready, set, and go - and don’t worry about getting a motion sickness!



Play with your friends (online multiplayer, up to 8 players), or face ruthless AI. Cross the finish line first, make new time records and become a Cyber Racer master!



Drive your cart with only one hand, use the other one to get advantage to outrun opponents - click a button to use boost, form a mist behind you or shoot a rocket straight into your rivals to slow them down!



Try each one of the 12 diverse racing tracks existing in 3 unique worlds. Compete with others to the rhythm of fancy tunes at the music levels and enjoy lots of special effects. Discover world’s most famous constructions and buildings from all around the globe. Or would you like something more out of this world? Try space levels and race through cosmic places among the stars or face fearless and majestic fantasy creatures!


.
